name: VIDEO: Delivering on Protective Equipment Donations
description: For front-line workers, personal protective equipment like masks and gloves are essential in the fight against COVID-19. However, global demand has made supplies scare.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
For front-line workers, personal protective equipment like masks and gloves are essential in the fight against COVID-19. However, global demand has made supplies scare. Here in San Diego County, Rady Children’s Foundation and the Rock Church have joined forces to collect these items for the County to distribute to the workers who need them.
If you’re interested in donating, visit the COVID-19 Medical Equipment Initiative.
